full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHING RTA CHEN PO 'PHAGS PA THOGS MED LA BSTOD PA DAD GUS RIN CHEN 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES SHING RTA CHEN PO 'PHAGS PA THOGS MED ZHABS LA SKU TSE 'DI NYID KYI RNAM THAR THUN MONG BA RJES SU DRAN PA'I SGO NAS BSTOD CING GSOL BA BTAB PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA DAD GUS RIN CHEN 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, GYI NA BA BLO BZANG CHOS 'DZIN GYIS DON GNYER BA 'GA' ZHIG GI 'DOD MOS LTAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE BSHES BLO BZANG TSE RING NGO, ,)
